column1: Enable albums module for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Directory / Pages Plugin". If enabled, Albums App will also be enabled for the Pages created so far under the default package.
column2: Enable albums module for the default package that was created upon installation of the "Directory / Circles Plugin". If enabled, Albums App will also be enabled for the Circles created so far under the default package.

column1: What maximum limit should be applied to the number of characters in the title of items in the widgets? (Enter a number between 1 and 999. Titles having more characters than this limit will be truncated. Complete titles will be shown on mouseover.)

column1: These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

Album Tag Options

column1: Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post tags on their album photos. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post tags on album photos.
column2: Your users can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post tags on their album photos. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post tags on album photos.
Circle’s Photo of the Day

column1: Displays the Photo of the Day as selected by the Admin from the Photo of the Day section of Directory / Pages - Albums Plugin.
column2: Displays the Photo of the Day as selected by the Admin from the Photo of the Day section of Directory / Circles - Albums Plugin.

column1: This widget forms the Albums tab on the Page Profile and displays the albums of the Page. It also displays the photos added by the Page visitors other than the owner. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
column2: This widget forms the Albums tab on the Circle Profile and displays the albums of the Circle. It also displays the photos added by the Circle visitors other than the owner. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Circle Profile.
Circle Profile Random Albums

column1: Displays random albums and photos of Page on its Profile.
column2: Displays random albums and photos of Circle on its Profile.
Circle Profile Most Commented Photos

column1: Displays list of page’s most commented photos. This widget should be placed on the Page Profile.
column2: Displays list of circle’s most commented photos. This widget should be placed on the Circle Profile.
Most Commented Photos

column1: Displays list of Page's most liked photos.
column2: Displays list of Circle's most liked photos.
Most Liked Photos

column1: Displays some photos out of all the albums of a Page in a strip. Page Admin can choose which photos to be shown in the strip by hiding the ones that should not be displayed. Hidden photos are replaced by new photos and so on. This widget should be placed on the Page Profile.
column2: Displays some photos out of all the albums of a Circle in a strip. Circle Admin can choose which photos to be shown in the strip by hiding the ones that should not be displayed. Hidden photos are replaced by new photos and so on. This widget should be placed on the Circle Profile.
Circle’s Featured Photos

column1: Displays Featured Photos as chosen by you. You can set the count of the number of photos to show in this widget. If the total number of photos featured are more than that count, then the photos to be displayed will be randomly picked up.
column2: Displays Featured Photos as chosen by you. You can set the count of the number of photos to show in this widget. If the total number of photos featured are more than that count, then the photos to be displayed will be randomly picked up.
Circle’s Featured Albums Slideshow

column1: Displays featured albums in an attractive slideshow. You can set the count of the number of albums to show in this widget. If the total number of albums featured are more than that count, then the albums to be displayed will be sequentially picked up.
column2: Displays featured albums in an attractive slideshow. You can set the count of the number of albums to show in this widget. If the total number of albums featured are more than that count, then the albums to be displayed will be sequentially picked up.
Circle’s Featured Photos Carousel

column1: This widget contains an attractive AJAX based carousel, showcasing the featured photos on the site. Multiple settings of this widget makes it highly configurable.
column2: This widget contains an attractive AJAX based carousel, showcasing the featured photos on the site. Multiple settings of this widget makes it highly configurable.
Photos in a Row

column1: (number of photos to show in one row. Note: This field is applicable only when you have selected ‘Horizontal’ in ‘Carousel Type’ field.)
column2: (number of photos to show in one row. Note: This field is applicable only when you have selected ‘Horizontal’ in ‘Carousel Type’ field.)
